preparation.raw_text:

 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine 12 g of cobalt, 3 g of manganese, 6 g of samarium, and 1 g of technetium. 
 3. Mix thoroughly with a spatula or mechanical mixer to ensure uniform distribution of all components.
